subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is the oldest fort in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन से ताजा है ?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort is the oldest fort in Rajasthan. It was built in 15th century by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: कुंभलगढ़ कंप का राजस्थान में ताजा है। 15वें जन्मित कर्मचारी Kumbha ने इस कंप ने बना।
